name: SafeAreaRegions
desc: A set of symbolic safe area regions.

items.name: static let container: SafeAreaRegions
items.desc: The safe area defined by the device and containers within the user interface, including elements such as top and bottom bars.

items.name: static let keyboard: SafeAreaRegions
items.desc: The safe area matching the current extent of any software keyboard displayed over the view content.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new option set from the given raw value.

items.name: let rawValue: UInt
items.desc: The corresponding value of the raw type.

items.name: typealias RawValue
items.desc: The raw type that can be used to represent all values of the conforming type.

items.name: typealias Element
items.desc: The element type of the option set.

items.name: typealias ArrayLiteralElement
items.desc: The type of the elements of an array literal.
